altTitles.ja: ヤンキーJKクズハナちゃん

altTitles.pt-br: Garota Delinquente Do Ensino Médio Kuzuhana-chan

description.en: At the beginning of the academic year, Saotome Hodaka enrolls into Moteshiro Prefectural High School, a former all-girls school that had recently integrated, but discovers it has a male to female ratio of 1:359! While most might think of this as a paradise, the majority of the students are delinquents and Saotome immediately finds himself being extorted by some of the more aggressive girls. However, he is inadvertently saved by Hanako Kuzuryu, a beautiful delinquent who just wants to be left alone. Is this the start of a new friendship? And how will Saotome's life unfold in a school full of troublesome women?
description.fr: Au début de l'année scolaire, Saotome Hodaka intègre le lycée préfectoral de Moteshiro, ancien établissement réservé aux filles et récemment devenu mixte. Il découvre rapidement que le ratio garçons/filles est de 1:359! Bien que cela puisse sembler être un paradis pour certains, la majorité des élèves sont des délinquantes, et Saotome se retrouve aussitôt extorqué par certaines des filles les plus agressives. Par chance, il est sauvé malgré lui par Hanako Kuzuryu, une belle délinquante qui aspire seulement à être laissée en paix. Est-ce le début d'une nouvelle amitié ? Comment la vie de Saotome évoluera-t-elle dans une école pleine de filles turbulentes ?
description.ja: 男女比率1対359!! 359人の女子高生にいじられまくり!! つらたんハーレム学園ラブコメ!! コワかわ最強ヒロイン爆誕!! 四方八方ギャルだらけな県立茂手城高校に入学した黒一点・早乙女穂高は、ヤンキーJK・九頭竜華子にピンチを救われて…!?
description.pt-br: Uma proporção de homem para mulher de 1:359?! Saotome-kun é admitido em uma escola cheia de gyarus e conhece uma garota delinqüente chamada Hanako Kuzuryu.

altTitles.ja: CLANNAD オフィシャルコミック
クラナド

description.en:
Clannad is set in a high-school located in a Japanese town. Tomoya Okazaki is a third-year student who doesn't take his studies seriously. Always late for class, he's seen as a delinquent by the rest of his classmates who are busy preparing for their entrance examinations. Needless to say, he doesn't have too many close friends either.  
  
Tomoya seems not to mind too–until he meets a few other girls from his school. Though he doesn't care much about them at first, he soon opens his heart to them as they get to know each other better.  
  
Clannad is a romantic youth drama that's likely to be more down-to-earth than Key's other works. But like Kanon and Air, Clannad's story is expected to be another touching and heart-breaking weeper.  
  
Based off the game of the same name by Key.

altTitles.ja: 何かと無自覚な女子

altTitles.en: The Manager and The Oblivious Waitress
A Girl who is Unaware of Something

description.ja: カフェでアルバイトをする女子高校生、熊野蜜(くまのみつ)はスタイル抜群で大人びた16歳。しかし思わせぶりな発言や大胆な行動など、そのすべてがとっても「無自覚」。おかげでバイト先の店長、日暮夕弥(ひぐらしゆうや)は毎日がキュン死寸前！！

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

altTitles.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

description.en:
No matter how hard things seem to be, there is always 'someone' watching over you.

A ghost who remained in this world with lingering attachments, one day encountered an office worker left exhausted from work, Nozaki.

"Nobody even looks at me..."

Nozaki was consumed with loneliness.
The ghost, who was all alone at the end of his own life, decided to watch over his daily life.

Though left at the mercy of his job, Nozaki desperately carried on each day.
Until one day, he encountered someone new.

The feelings he lost amid the restless day-to-day, through connecting with others, Nozaki will gradually take back.
description.ja:
どんなつらい時でも、見ていてくれる「誰か」がいる。

この世に未練を残してさまよっていた幽霊は、ある日、仕事に疲れた会社員、野崎と出会う。

「俺のことなんて、誰も見てないんだ…」

孤独感に打ちひしがれる野崎。人生の最後に一人ぼっちだった幽霊は、彼の生活を見守ってみることに。仕事に翻弄されながらも必死に日々を送る野崎。やがて彼に新たな出会いが訪れる。忙しない日々の中でこぼれ落ちてしまった気持ちを、野崎は人との関わりの中で、少しずつ取り戻していく――。

altTitles.ja: ともだちごっこ

description.en: St Dorothea's Academy is a prestigious all girls' school with top scores and rich history. It's famed for the strong bonds which the students share with each other, known for being eternal. Every year, two friends with the closest bond are chosen to represent the school and guide their fellow students. They are known as "les reines du printemps." With flowers being scattered, a game of friendship and betrayal starts…

altTitles.ja: 最強の王様、二度目の人生は何をする？

altTitles.es-la: La Vida Después de la Muerte

description.de:
In einer Welt regiert durch die stärksten Kämpfer ist König Grey der unangefochten Stärkste, Reichste und Berühmteste. Aber eine solche Macht kommt Hand in Hand mit Einsamkeit. Unter der glamourösen Erscheinung eines mächtigen Königs liegt die leere Hülle eines Mannes, beraubt von Ziel und Willen.

Nach einer Wiedergeburt in eine Welt voller Magie und Monster hat der König die Möglichkeit, sein Leben erneut zu leben. Die Fehler seiner Vergangenheit zu korrigieren wird aber nicht seine einzige Herausforderung sein. Unter dem Frieden und Reichtum dieser neuen Welt lauert etwas, das alles vernichten kann, was er jemals erreicht hat, was seine Rolle darin und den Grund für seine Wiedergeburt in Frage stellt.
description.en:
King Grey has unrivaled strength, wealth, and prestige in a world governed by martial ability. However, solitude lingers closely behind those with great power. Beneath the glamorous exterior of a powerful king lurks the shell of man, devoid of purpose and will.

Reincarnated into a new world filled with magic and monsters, the king has a second chance to relive his life. Correcting the mistakes of his past will not be his only challenge, however. Underneath the peace and prosperity of the new world is an undercurrent threatening to destroy everything he has worked for, questioning his role and reason for being born again.
description.fr:
Le Roi Grey a une force, une richesse et un prestige inégalés dans un monde gouverné par l'aptitude martiale. Cependant, la solitude s'approche de près derrière ceux ayant de grands pouvoirs. Sous l'apparence glamour d'un Roi puissant se cache la carapace de l'homme, dépourvue de volonté et de but.

Réincarné dans un nouveau monde rempli de monstres et de magie, le Roi a une seconde chance de revivre sa vie. Cependant, corriger les erreurs de sa précédente vie ne sera pas sa seule tâche. Sous la paix et la prospérité de ce nouveau monde se cache une menace sous-jacente remettant en question tout ce pour quoi il a travaillé, son rôle, et sa raison de renaître.
description.ja: 私は史上最強の「王」である。数多の敵を退け、数々の功績を残した歴代最高の覇王だ。 しかし、ある朝目覚めた私は奇妙な違和感を覚える。手足が短い、視界が極端に低い、見知らぬ男女が私を「アーサー」と呼び、微笑みながら覗き込む。そう…私は無力な赤子に転生してしまったのだ！最強の王様がいたいけな赤ちゃんに転生する、痛快冒険ファンタジー‼
description.pl:
Król Gray ma niezrównaną siłę, bogactwo i prestiż w świecie rządzonym przez umiejętności walki. Jednak samotność pozostaje tuż za tymi, którzy mają wielką moc. Pod olśniewającą powierzchownością potężnego króla kryje się skorupa człowieka, pozbawionego celu i woli.

Wskrzeszony w nowym świecie wypełnionym magią i potworami, król ma drugą szansę na ponowne przeżycie swojego życia. Jednak naprawienie błędów przeszłości nie będzie jego jedynym wyzwaniem. Pod pokojem i dobrobytem nowego świata kryje się ukryty nurt, który grozi zniszczeniem wszystkiego, na co pracował, kwestionując jego rolę i powód narodzin na nowo.
description.ru: Король Грей обладает непревзойденной силой, богатством и престижем в мире, во главе которого стоит боевая мощь. Однако одиночество обычно появляется именно у тех, кто обладает большой властью. Мало кто знает, но под гламурной внешностью могущественного короля скрывается оболочка человека, лишённого цели и воли.
description.pt-br:
Dizem que a solidão acompanha aqueles com grande poder. Permanecendo como um Rei com força incomparável, status, e fama… e muito mais. Eu, que uma vez lutei para viver, me afogava em meu raso trono sem nenhuma vontade ou propósito. Haviam muitos que tinham inveja de mim, mas eu diria de bom grado, “Tirem tudo de mim! Será meu presente!” Um dia, eu finalmente consegui meu presente – uma nova vida.

Com uma segunda chance de corrigir meus erros e cumprir meus arrependimentos, permita-me mostrar a você o que um (ex-rei) pode fazer!

description.en:
In 2024, Na Gang-in wakes up in the heart of South Korea. He can't remember who he is or where he is, but through a combat support AI named Jeon Ji-in embedded in his body, he discovers he's affiliated with the Earth Alliance from 2082. 

To regain his memories and figure out why he ended up here, he needs to gather information. With nothing to his name but plenty of skills, this is Na Gang-in's clumsy journey of adapting to Earth!
description.ko:
2024년 대한민국 한복판에서 눈을 뜬 나강인. 자신이 누구인지, 이곳이 어디인지도 기억나지 않지만몸 안에 내장된 전투지원 AI 전지인을 통해2082년 지구연합군 소속이었다는 걸 알게 된다.

기억을 되찾고 이곳에 온 이유를 알기 위해선 정보를 수집해야 하는데. 가진 건 없고 할 줄 아는 건 많은 나강인의 우당탕탕 지구 적응기!

ジャンプコミックス

description.en:
Gabimaru the Empty, a former ninja assassin feared as a heartless husk of a man, spends his days on death row wondering when an executioner skilled enough to so much as harm him will arrive, as he thinks nothing of seeing an end to his meaningless existence… Or so he thought. 
Then the lady executioner, Asaemon the Beheader, rekindles his hope with an astounding proposition. 
If he ever wishes to see his beloved wife again, he must embark under the auspices of the shogunate on a perilous voyage to the mysterious mystic island said to house the elixir of immortality. 
Should he be the one among many rival death-row fiends and scoundrels to find the elixir, he'll earn a full exoneration, and, more importantly, a chance at an ordinary married life with the light of his life: the woman who made the world seem not so ugly. 
What awaits them is a journey like no other!
description.ru: Это случилось во времена правления одиннадцатого сёгуна из династии Токугава… Габимару, некогда сильнейший синоби, собиравшийся покинуть свою деревню, захвачен в плен. Но Ямада Асаэмон, девушка-палач, предложила ему прощение и свободу с одним условием… Он должен заполучить в райских землях эликсир бессмертия!.. Романтические приключения и искусство ниндзюцу от Каку Юдзи.
description.pt-br: Gabimaru, o Vazio, é um dos ninjas assassinos mais cruéis que já saiu da vila de Iwagakure. Ele é implacavelmente eficiente, mas uma traição resulta em uma sentença de morte. Só há uma esperança para ter sua liberdade: viajar para uma ilha escondida e conseguir um elixir, que tornará o shogun imortal. O fracasso não é uma opção, nesta ilha, o Céu e o Inferno estão a um metro de distância.

description.en:
A twisted girls' love story featuring: A devilish girl hiding behind the mask of an honor student x An ordinary girl who hates losing.

Wakaba Yoshizawa has a childhood friend named Komaki Umezono.

This girl wore the mask of an honor student with good morals who's blessed with both beauty and brains, but in reality she's an evil genius who looked down on people. For the sake of regaining the dignity she lost to Komaki, Wakaba challenges her to a match, but Komaki tells her "Each time I win, I will take one precious thing from you." as a condition!? Every time she loses to the girl she "hates", her true feelings get exposed.

(Source: Young Ace Up)
description.ja:
「嫌い」な彼女に負けるたび、曝け出されるホントの気持ち――。

吉沢わかばの幼馴染、梅園小牧。彼女は、品行方正で才色兼備な優等生の仮面を被った、人を見下す性悪女だった。そんな小牧に奪われた尊厳を取り戻すため、彼女に勝負を挑むわかばだったが、「私が勝ったらわかばの大事なものを一つずつ奪う」という条件をつけられて――!?ファーストキスに始まり、一つ一つ「尊厳」を奪われていく中で、小牧に抱く気持ちが「嫌い」だけでないことに気付きーー？
description.th: อุเมะโซโนะ โคมากิ เพื่อนสมัยเด็กของ โยชิซาวะ วาคาบะ เธอสวมหน้ากากนักเรียนดีเด่นทั้งที่เป็นผู้หญิงชั่วร้าย ที่ชอบดูถูกผู้คน เพื่อกอบกู้ศักดิ์ศรีที่โคมากิแย่งชิงไปจากเธอ วาคาบะ จึงต้องแข่งขันกับเธอ โดยมีเงื่อนไขว่าถ้าชนะ เธอจะพรากสิ่งสำคัญหนึ่งอย่างของวาคาบะไป...!? "ฉันเกลียดเธอ!" ถึงจะเป็นแบบนั้น ทุกครั้งที่พ่ายแพ้ความรู้สึกที่แท้จริงก็ค่อย ๆ ถูกเปิดเผยออกมา
description.es-la:
¡Una distorsionada historia de amor entre la estudiante modelo con una máscara demoníaca y la chica común que no se rinde!

Wakaba Yoshizawa, la amiga de la infancia de Wakaba, Komaizumi Komaki. Ella era una chica malvada que llevaba una máscara de estudiante modelo perfecta y talentosa, que miraba por encima del hombro a los demás. Wakaba desafía a Komaki para recuperar su dignidad que le fue arrebatada, pero se le pone una condición: "Si gano, tomaré una cosa importante de Wakaba una por una" ¡Cada vez que pierde contra ella, revela sus verdaderos sentimientos! ¡Una emocionante historia de amor entre chicas que ganó el Premio de Oro en el 28vo Concurso Sneaker Award, ahora en formato de cómic!
description.pt-br:
Uma história de amor distorcida entre garotas: uma garota diabólica escondida por trás da máscara de uma estudante exemplar x uma garota comum que odeia perder.

Wakaba Yoshizawa tem uma amiga de infância chamada Komaki Umezono.

Essa garota usava a máscara de uma estudante exemplar com boas virtudes, abençoada com beleza e inteligência, mas na realidade ela é uma gênio do mal que despreza as pessoas. Para recuperar a dignidade perdida para Komaki, Wakaba desafia-a para um duelo, mas Komaki lhe diz: "Cada vez que eu ganhar, vou tirar algo precioso de você." como condição!? Cada vez que ela perde para a garota que "odeia", seus verdadeiros sentimentos são expostos.

description.en: When one day a Meteorite crushed on earth, the lifes of the three best friends Hitokazu, Nic and Victor suddenly changed as on their last jointed school-year they are faced with the consequences the meteorite brought with itself. The people that had survived the impact have suddenly developed powers and abilities human beings normally can not achieve but those who didnt gain those new abilities, just dissolved.

description.en:
Among the class transported to another world, Nagumo Hajime is an ordinary male student who didn’t have ambition nor aspiration in life, and thus called “Incompetent” by his classmates.
The class was summoned to become heroes and save a country from destruction. Students of the class were blessed with cheat specifications and cool job class, however, it was not the case with Hajime, with his profession as a “Synergist”, and his very mediocre stats. “Synergist”, to put it in another word was just artisan class. Being the weakest, he then falls to the depth of the abyss when he and his classmates were exploring a dungeon. What did he find in the depth of the abyss, and can he survive?


---

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/s/arifureta-from-commonplace-to-world-s-strongest)
description.fr:
Le quotidien de l’étudiant ordinaire qu’est Hajime Nagumo, dont la vie ne se comporte que de nuits blanches et siestes en cours, se retrouve bouleversé lorsque sa classe et lui se retrouvent transportés en tant qu’héros dans un autre monde afin de le sauver… Alors que tout le monde obtient des jobs assez puissants, notre héros se retrouve avec le job « Synergiste », assez inutile en l’état des choses, humilié et jeté seul dans les tréfonds d’un donjon, arrivera-t-il à survivre ?


---

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/s/arifureta-from-commonplace-to-world-s-strongest)
description.it:
Tra gli studenti trasportati in un altro mondo, Nagumo Hajime è uno studente senza ambizioni ed aspirazioni nella vita, è infatti soprannominato l’Incapace dai suoi compagni.
Gli studenti sono stati evocati per ergersi ad eroi e salvare il paese dalla distruzione. A loro sono stati donati poteri e classi di livello, a tutti tranne che a Nagumo Hajime, che inizia da Sinergista con statistiche mediocri.
Il Sinergista, è in altre parole un “crafter”. Essendo il più debole, finisce per cadere nelle profondità di un abisso durante l'esplorazione di un sotterraneo. 
Cosa troverà nelle profondità dell’abisso... e riuscirà a sopravvivere?
description.ja: 『趣味の合間に人生』を座右の銘としている南雲ハジメは、突然クラスメイトと共に異世界に召喚されてしまう。現地人とは比べ物にならない能力を皆が発現させる中、ハジメが発現させたのは、ごくありふれた能力である"錬成師"だった……。
description.pl:
Wśród uczniów klasy przeniesionej do innego świata, Hajime Nagumo niczym się nie wyróżnia; ot najzwyklejszy w świecie uczeń niemający ambicji czy życiowego celu, dlatego też nazywany w klasie "Nieudacznikiem".
Gdy cała klasa trafiła do innego świata, by zostać bohaterami i ocalić cały kraj przed zniszczeniem, wszyscy zostali pobłogosławieni oszukańczymi statystykami i świetnymi profesjami… za wyjątkiem Hajime, który skończył z profesją "Synergetyka" i przeciętnymi statystykami. "Synergetyk", ujmując to inaczej, jest zwyczajną klasą rzemieślniczą. Będąc najsłabszym w klasie, spada w głąb otchłani podczas wspólnego eksplorowania lochu. Czego dowiedział się w jej czeluściach i czy uda mu się przetrwać?


---

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/s/arifureta-from-commonplace-to-world-s-strongest)
description.ru:
Хадзимэ Нагумо, живущий по принципу «Первым делом - хобби», и весь его класс вдруг призывают в другой мир. Одноклассники один за другим открывают невероятные по меркам этого мира способности, ну а Хадзимэ достается бесполезный ремесленный класс «Синергист». Оказавшись в самых глубинах преисподней, он находит применения своему заурядному таланту и стремится найти выход из лабиринта…  


---

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/s/arifureta-from-commonplace-to-world-s-strongest)
description.es-la:
Entre la clase transportada a otro mundo, Nagumo Hajime es un estudiante normal y corriente que no tiene ambiciones ni aspiraciones en la vida, por lo que sus compañeros le llaman "Incompetente".
La clase fue convocada para convertirse en héroes y salvar a un país de la destrucción. Los estudiantes de la clase fueron bendecidos con habilidades tramposas y una categoría de trabajo genial, sin embargo, no fue el caso de Hajime, con su profesión de "Sinergista", y sus estadísticas muy mediocres. "Sinergista", para decirlo en otra palabra era simplemente la clase artesanal. Siendo el más débil, entonces cae a la profundidad del abismo cuando él y sus compañeros estaban explorando una mazmorra. ¿Qué encontró en la profundidad del abismo, y podrá sobrevivir?
description.pt-br: Entre a turma transportada para outro mundo, Nagumo Hajime é um estudante do sexo masculino comum que não tem ambição nem aspiração na vida, e, portanto, chamado de " incompetente" por seus colegas. A classe foi convocada para se tornar heróis e salvar um país da destruição. Os alunos da classe foram abençoados com as especificações de trapaça e classes legais, no entanto, não foi o caso com Hajime , com a sua profissão como um " Synergist " , e suas estatísticas muito medíocres. "Synergist", para colocá-lo em outras palavrsa era apenas a classe dos artesãos. Sendo o mais fraco , então ele cai para a profundidade do abismo , quando ele e seus colegas estavam explorando uma dungeon. O que ele encontra na profundidade do abismo, e ele pode sobreviver?

altTitles.ja: 忍者パパ

description.en: Nobu, a 32 year old salary man, is spreading justice from the shadows as a ninja while maintaining his family and working at his company. What he doesn't know is that he is being followed by mysterious persons and his gifted family. Can he put everything in order?

altTitles.ja: 師匠、あと49回死んでください

description.en:
When the powerless thirteenth prince became emperor, he gave his tutor, Yo Yohwa, poison. His reason being his death at the hands of his own master in countless previous lives. The poisoned Yo Yohwa then regresses to an earlier time together with the prince and is determined to get on his good side this time in order to escape. However, the prince already discovered the truth…

“This is crazy. You killed me in the previous lives, and you neglected me in another. Now you’re acting all nice. Are you trying to get away?”

altTitles.ja: ゴブリンスレイヤー

description.en:
A young priestess has formed her first adventuring party, but almost immediately they find themselves in distress. Luckily for her, the Goblin Slayer chose that place as his next killing grounds–a man who's dedicated his life to the extermination of all goblins, by any means necessary. And when rumors of his feats begin to circulate, there's no telling who might come calling next.  

**NOTE:**   
- There are *currently* no English scanlations of this manga. The chapters on the net are the official YenPress chapters.  
As long as they **(YenPress' chapters)** are in publication they are not allowed on MangaDex.  
  
**Links:**  
- [Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/GoblinSlayer_GA)  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://ga.sbcr.jp/sp/goblin_slayer/)  
- [Official Anime (JP)](http://www.goblinslayer.jp/)
description.pt: Uma sacerdotisa formou seu primeiro grupo de aventureiros, mas, quase imediatamente se encontram em apuros pelos goblins. E o Goblin Slayer é quem vem ao resgate – um homem que tem dedicado sua vida a exterminação de todos os goblins, através de qualquer meio necessário.
description.ru: Юная жрица вместе со своей командой впервые отправилась на поиски приключений, но они тут же попали в беду. На помощь им приходит Убийца Гоблинов – таинственный мечник, посвятивший свою жизнь уничтожению всех гоблинов любыми средствами. В итоге девушка присоединяется к нему в постоянном походе против всевозможных пород гоблинов, в котором сталкивается с новыми тайнами, врагами, друзьями, а иногда и конкурентками.
description.vi: Một nữ tu sĩ trẻ đã thành lập nhóm phiêu lưu đầu tiên của mình, nhưng gần như ngay lập tức họ thấy mình đang đau khổ. Đó là Goblin Slayer đến giải cứu — một người đã cống hiến cuộc sống của mình cho việc tiêu diệt tất cả những yêu tinh, bằng mọi cách cần thiết. Và khi những tin đồn về những kỳ công của anh ấy bắt đầu lan truyền, thì không ai nói được ai có thể gọi tới...
description.pt-br: Um homem deseja tornar-se um “aventureiro”, cujo lema é: “Eu não vou salvar o mundo, eu apenas vou matar goblins.” Após ouvir rumores sobre ele, uma elfa se aproxima dele com um pedido.

title.en: I Am the Youngest Daughter of Murim’s Strongest, the Namgung Clan

altTitles.en: Youngest Daughter of the Ultimate Martial Master Namgung Family

description.en:
"B-baa, baaah?! (Did I become a baby?! What about my revenge?!)
Everyone in the Namgung family despised me. My life was one where even my siblings turned their backs on me.
But at the moment when the family was annihilated, the choice my siblings made… was not the family, but me.

‘I never once thought of you as anything but family.’
‘Live. Even if it’s disgraceful and filthy, live, Ahee.’

Why did they save me?
A question I held in my heart my entire life as I carried out my revenge.
I thought I could finally close my eyes at the end of it all.

‘Baaah?’

I’ve returned to the past!
Could this be some black magic from the Blood Cult?
My… my revenge? My peaceful rest?!
And why are the Namgung siblings clinging to me again?!

What on earth is going on?!"

altTitles.ja: 江口さんちの純情サキュバス

description.en: Eguchi Hibiki is a manga artist who has knowledge but no understanding of erotica. While wondering what exactly erotica is, Hibiki meets Yasaki Mia, a succubus who is also wondering about erotica. The two are somewhat similar and decide to work together to understand "true erotica."

title.en: Arifureta Shokugyou de Sekai Saikyou Zero

altTitles.en: Arifureta: From Commonplace to World's Strongest Zero
From Common Job Class to the Strongest in the World Zero

altTitles.ru: Арифурэта: Сильнейший ремесленник в мире. Zero |

altTitles.ja: ありふれた職業で世界最強 零

altTitles.zh: 平凡职业成就世界最强 零

description.en: Long before any child of Earth came to the world of Tortus, the Liberators fought their own war: a struggle against the gods themselves. Oscar Orcus was never the type to seek out that kind of conflict. He lives a simple life as a magical craftsman. But when the powerful magician Miledi Reisen barges into his life, he’s swept up into the tides of history. When the two of them meet, sparks fly that will set the whole world ablaze!
description.ru:
Оскар Оркус. До ужаса талантливый синергист. Он всеми силами старается скрыть свои способности, чтобы его мирные деньки длились как можно дольше.

Миледи Райсэн. Носитель древней магии и в то же время наследница «семьи палачей». А ещё она лелеет мысль изменить этот мир.

В момент, когда они встретились, судьба тех, кто воспротивились богу, начали меняться…


---

title.en: Kuse Tsuyo Kanojo wa Toko ni Izanau

altTitles.ja: クセ強彼女は床にいざなう

altTitles.ja-ro: Kuse Tsuyo Kanojo ha Toko ni Izanau

altTitles.en: A Quirky Girl is Inviting Me to Bed

description.en: Naoto Kiyoshi is a young man who just entered university after failing his entrance exams one year before. When he was looking for a place to live in so that he could move to Tokyo, he found himself living together with Luna, a relative and older girl who he used to have a crush on. The Luna he admired in the past was neat, beautiful and mature... and now she apparently became a slut!? Night after night, he hears her seductive and unladylike moans, and it's making Naoto horny. There are also other men she's unreasonably close to besides him. Luna, whose thoughts he couldn't fathom, is leading him around by the nose! Furthermore, other women with lewd quirks aside from Luna have also gathered there!?
description.ja: 一浪して大学に合格した青年・木吉直人。上京のために住める場所を探していたところ、親戚で憧れの姉・月(ルナ)の家で同棲することに。 昔憧れていた月は垢ぬけて、美しく成長し…そして…ビッチになっていた!?夜な夜なあられもない嬌声を聞き、モンモンとする直人。他の男性がいる割に距離感もめちゃくちゃ近い。何を考えているか分からない月に翻弄され、さらに月以外のエッチで癖が強い女の子たちも集まりだし…!?
description.pt-br:
De repente estou morando com a garota mais velha por quem eu tinha uma queda!? Ainda mais, estou começando a suspeitar que ela é uma vagabunda!?

Naoto Kiyoshi é um jovem que acabou de entrar na universidade depois de ser reprovado nos exames de admissão um ano antes. Quando ele estava procurando um lugar para morar para poder se mudar para Tóquio, ele se viu morando com Luna, uma parente e garota mais velha por quem ele tinha uma queda.

A Luna que ele admirava no passado era arrumada, bonita e madura... e agora ela aparentemente se tornou uma vagabunda!? Noite após noite, ele ouve seus gemidos sedutores e pouco femininos, e isso está deixando Naoto excitado. Há também outros homens de quem ela é irracionalmente próxima além dele. Luna, cujos pensamentos ele não conseguia entender, está o levando pelo nariz! Além disso, outras mulheres com peculiaridades obscenas além de Luna também se reuniram lá!?

Este é o início de sua nova vida emocionante cercado por garotas mais velhas safadas(?)!

altTitles.en: The Demon Lord Levels Up With Martial Arts

description.en:
Now that the demonic realm and the heavenly realm have called a truce, the human world has returned to an era of peace.

Jeon Minchul lives the life of an ordinary college student until the day he comes across an artifact from the war and remembers — in his past life, he was the demon king who brought the world to its knees.

Upon recalling these memories, Minchul awakens his old powers, along with some new ones. But can this demon king harness the powers of both good and evil to protect the peace?
description.ko:
“마왕.”

그건.
인간이 되기 전, 전생의 나를 부르던 말이었다.

title.en: Soul Land II - The Peerless Tang Sect

altTitles.en: Đấu La Đại Lục 2 - Tuyệt Thế Đường Môn
Soul Land 2 - The Peerless Tang Sect
斗罗大陆2 - 绝世唐门
Soul Land II - The Unrivaled Tang Sect
Soul Land 2 - The Unrivaled Tang Sect

description.en:
A land without magic, dou-qi, martial arts, but with essence spirits instead. This is the continent 10,000 years after the formation of the Tang Sect. A new hero and his friend walk the land, a new "Seven Monsters of Shriek." Will they keep up the name of the Tang Sect? Or will it crumble due to a new essence system?  

---

**Notes:**
- This is Soul Land's sequel, but you don't have to read it before reading this. There might be spoilers though.
- Starting at chapter 181, the manhua format changes to long strip.

altTitles.ja: 最果てに惑う

altTitles.es-la: Perdido en los extremos más bajos

description.en: After his little sister was raped and killed herself, a teenage boy took revenge and killed her rapist in return. Seven years later the boy's released from prison, determined to kill himself due to insufferable guilt but then he's confronted by the rapist's daughter. A dramatic tale of guilt and atonement.
description.ru:
«Семь лет назад я убил человека».

Расправившись с преступником, который довёл его сестру, Юри, до самоубийства, Кадзума был приговорён к семи годам тюремного заключения. Даже после выхода на свободу его преследуют мысли о совершённом убийстве и о девочке, наблюдавшей за происходящим. Терзаемый чувством вины, Кадзума принимает решение искупить свои грехи собственной смертью. Вместе со своей матерью он навещает могилу Юри, где замечает знакомое лицо девочки...

Это история о несчастной судьбе дочери преступника-потерпевшего.
description.es-la:
Después de que su hermana pequeña Yuri fuera violada y debido a esto se suicidara, su hermano Kazuma decide tomar venganza y matar a su violador. 

7 años después, él sale de prisión, decidido a suicidarse debido a una culpa insoportable y para estar paz con su hermana, pero luego accidentalmente conoce a Shiika, la hija del violador de su hermana. Una historia dramática de culpa y expiación.

altTitles.ja: 二度生きるランカー

altTitles.en: Ranker Who Lives A Second Time

altTitles.th: เกมชีวิตที่สอง ของแรงเกอร์

description.en:
Yeonwoo’s brother disappeared years ago, and he’s devastated to learn of his death.

As he copes with his loss, he’s given a pocket watch and learns there’s more to his brother’s death: he was betrayed while competing in the Tower of the Sun God.

Now it’s Yeonwoo’s turn to use the knowledge his brother left behind.

Can Yeonwoo navigate that world and gain enough power and experience to reach the top of the tower, defeating his brother’s enemies and all those who stand in his way?

---

- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%91%90-%EB%B2%88-%EC%82%AC%EB%8A%94-%EB%9E%AD%EC%BB%A4/2335)
description.fr:
Yeon-woo avait un frère jumeau qui a disparu il y a cinq ans. Un jour, une montre de poche laissée par son frère est retournée en sa possession. À l'intérieur, il a trouvé un journal intime caché dans lequel on pouvait lire : "Le temps que tu entendes ceci, je serai déjà mort…".  
l'Obélisque, la Tour du Dieu Soleil, un monde où plusieurs univers et dimensions se croisent. Dans ce monde, son frère avait été victime d'une trahison en montant la tour. Après avoir appris la vérité, Yeon-woo décida d'escalader la tour avec le journal de son frère.  
Yeon-woo passe ensuite par les mêmes épreuves que son frère cadet et combat en tant que joueur anonyme. Son but ? Vaincre la Tour de l'Obélisque et venger son frère.
description.id: Setelah 5 tahun hilang, Cha Yeonwoo menemukan fakta bahwa adiknya, Cha Jungwoo, sudah meninggal. Ketika membongkar barang peninggalan adiknya, dia menemukan sebuah jam saku. Jam saku itu adalah hadiahnya untuk Jungwoo supaya lulus ujian. Begitu membuka jam tersebut, Cha Yeonwoo mendengar suara adiknya yang menceritakan kehidupannya selama 5 tahun ini. Ternyata Cha Jungwoo bukan hilang melainkan terdampar di dunia lain. Di dunia itu pula Cha Jungwoo dikhianati dan dibunuh. Mendengar itu, amarah Cha Yeonwoo bangkit. Dia berniat balas dendam atas kematian adiknya. Berbekal pengetahuan yang dia dapat dari Jungwoo, Cha Yeonwoo pun pergi ke dunia lain tersebut. Berhasilkah Cha Yeonwoo balas dendam?!
description.it:
Yeon-woo aveva un fratello gemello scomparso cinque anni fa…  
Un giorno, un orologio da tasca lasciato da suo fratello è tornato in suo possesso. Dentro, ha trovato un diario nascosto nel quale è stato registrato “Quando ascolterai questo, immagino che sarò già morto …”
description.ja: ある日豪の元に届いた双子の弟・駿の訃報。 虚無感を感じる彼の元に駿の懐中時計が届く。 そして豪はその中に隠された駿の日記によって、 駿が道半ばで力尽きた太陽神の塔・オベリスクへと誘われていく―。 弟の復讐に燃える豪が挑む、痛快アクションファンタジー！
description.ko:
5년 전 사라진 쌍둥이 동생을 잊고 살던 연우.
어느날 그에게 동생의 유품인 회중시계가 돌아왔다.

그리고 그 속에 숨겨진 일기장.

'형이 이 일기를 들을 때 즈음이라면 나는 이미 이 세상 사람이 아니겠지.'

여러 차원과 우주가 교차하는 세계에 놓인 태양의 신 탑, 오벨리스크.
그리고 그곳에 오르다 배신당해 눈을 감아야 했던 동생.

모든 걸 알게 된 연우는 동생이 남겨 둔 일기와 함께 탑을 오르기 시작한다.

'오늘부터 난. 차정우이다.'
description.ru:
Ёну в течение 5 лет жил, смирившись с исчезновением своего младшего брата-близнеца. Однажды ему в руки попали карманные часы его брата.​ Внутри них он обнаружил спрятанную записку.​ «Брат, если ты сейчас слушаешь эти записи, то меня уже нет на Земле». Узнав о том, что его младший брат отправился в Обелиск — башню богов, которая находится где-то в космосе на пересечении нескольких измерений, и был предан, Ёну решает отправиться туда сам.
«С этого момента я буду Ча Чонъу.​»
description.th: ชายอนอู ชายหนุ่มที่น้องชายหายตัวไป พร้อมกับต้องเสียแม่ไปเพราะโรคร้ายได้ ได้ตัดสินใจไปเป็นทหารอาสาสมัครที่ประเทศแอฟริกา จนอยู่มาวันนึงเขาได้ค้นพบความจริงว่า น้องชายของเขาได้หายตัวไปขณะกำลังตามหา 'ยาอายุวัฒนะ' ของอีกโลกหนึ่ง เพื่อนำมารักษาแม่ พร้อมกับถ่ายโอนพลังทิ้งไว้แก่เขา
description.tr: Yeon-woo’nun kardeşi beş yıl önce ortadan kaybolmuştur. Bir gün kardeşinden kalan bir cep saati eline geçer. İçinde, kardeşinin bırakmış olduğu gizli bir günlüğün olduğunu fark eder. ”Sen bunu bulduğunda, ben çoktan bu dünyadan göçmüş olacağım.” Obelisk, güneş tanrısının kulesi, farklı evrenler ve boyutların iç içe geçtiği bir dünyadır. Kardeşi, bu dünyada kuleye tırmanmaya çalışırken ihanete uğrayıp hayatını kaybetmiştir. Gerçeği öğrenmiş olan Yeon-woo, kardeşinin günlüğü ile birlikte kuleye tırmanmaya karar verir. ”Şu andan itibaren ben, Cha Jeong-woo’yum.”
description.zh-hk:
延宇選擇遺忘5年前消失的雙胞胎弟弟，
過上屬於自己的生活，
卻在某天收到了弟弟的遺物——懷錶。

而在那懷錶之中，還隱藏著弟弟的日誌。

「當哥聽見我的日誌時，
也代表我已經不在這個世界上了吧。」

方尖碑——各個次元與宇宙交會的太陽神之塔。

弟弟就是在攻塔過程中遭受背叛，不幸喪命。

於是，得知一切真相的延宇帶著弟弟留下的日誌，
踏上了攻塔之路!

title.en: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件

altTitles.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais

altTitles.pl: Anioł z sąsiedztwa niezwykle mnie rozpieszcza

description.en: Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!
description.ja: 高校生の藤宮周が住むマンションの隣には、「天使様」と呼ばれる学校で一番の美少女・椎名真昼が住んでいる。特に関わり合いのなかった二人だが、雨の中ずぶ濡れになっていた彼女に傘を貸したことから、不思議な交流が始まった。自堕落な一人暮らしを送る周を見かねて、なにかと世話を焼く真昼。お互いに興味ないと言い合う二人は、それでも少しずつ距離を縮めていく……。
description.pl: Mahiru jest piękną dziewczyną, którą koledzy z klasy nazywają "aniołkiem". Jest nie tylko świetnie wysportowana i ma doskonałe oceny - jest także zabójczo piękna. Amane, przeciętny facet i samozwańczy niechluj, nigdy nie myślał zbyt wiele o tej boskiej piękności, mimo że uczęszczał do tej samej szkoły. Wszystko zmienia się jednak, gdy widzi Mahiru siedzącą samotnie w parku podczas ulewy. Tak zaczyna się dziwna relacja między tą nieprawdopodobną parą!
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

title.en: I Don't Feel Like Doing Anything

altTitles.en: I Don't Want To Do Anything

description.en:
One spring day, after the recent death of her mother, Summer decides to quit her stressful city job. She moves to a small beachside town, where she plans to use her entire life savings on two years of doing absolutely nothing. She calculates that she can subsist for this long without finding a job by leading a minimalist, free life. She finds peace and makes friends in her new environment But after a while, the walls of her home are repeatedly vandalized with death threats. Will Summer be able to catch the villain, find normalcy in her life, and make peace with herself?

description.en:
Flay Garnet has been fired from the academy after being set up by his colleague. He receives a job offer from a mysterious maid. The job offer is to be a tutor to the five daughters of the Demon King! At first, they didn’t trust him to be taught by a human, but as he demonstrates his abilities, he begins to gain the trust of the Demon King’s daughters.
Flay’s new life as an educator, under one roof with five cute but problematic girls with varying personalities, begins!
description.ja: 次代の英雄を育てる学院̶̶通称『勇者学院』。そこで教鞭をとっていたフレイは、同僚に嵌められてクビになってしまう。そんな彼は、謎のメイドから再就職先を斡旋される。その仕事とは、５人の魔王令嬢たちの家庭教師だった！英雄を育てていた教師が、魔王の娘たちを育てていく。

altTitles.ja: 一人だけレベルアップします！

description.en:
Living in a world infested with monsters is hard enough, but doing it without powers? That’s Hanyeol’s life in a nutshell.

Fearsome beasts roam the earth and kill everyone in their path. Elite members of society called the Awakened mobilize to protect humanity with their supernatural abilities. Amidst it all, Hanyeol is just a poor porter, tasked as sideline support.

But when a benevolent being gifts him with special abilities, he’s ready to harvest all the loot and take it to the next level!

description.en: Panthera, a totalitarian state where both brutal oppression and despair exist. Heroes who resisted the government were branded as traitors and executed. Now, the son of a fallen hero, Eden, must face the question: Can he survive in Panthera? In the near future, after a second nuclear war, the surviving humans continue to live in a small world called Panthera. However, the intense control and exploitation by the government has caused immense suffering, gradually turning various districts into slums. The “heroes” who once defied the regime and claimed to be superheroes were ruthlessly eliminated by cyborg killers under the government’s command. The few surviving heroes now hide their identities, barely scraping by in the slums. Disillusioned and filled with grief and hatred, people who once had a glimmer of hope in these heroes have now lost faith and stopped waiting for any saviors. One day, a seemingly ordinary high school student named Eden, who is frequently bullied by his classmates, experiences a “Soma Awakening,” a unique trait of superheroes. However, haunted by the memory of his father’s gruesome death as a hero, Eden rejects the life of a hero, longing for a normal life with his mother. Yet, the increasing oppression of the government and the threats to his only family make this difficult. In such a world, will Eden choose to become a hero and stand against the forces oppressing society? The journey of Eden—a beautiful yet scorched, intense yet chilling tale—begins.

altTitles.ja: せせせせ！～目指せ初H！童貞女子のときめき大作戦～

altTitles.en: Sesesese! ~Aiming For My First Time! A Virgin Girl's Heart-Pounding Grand Strategy~

description.en: A high-energy sexually-charged comedy! Nagara Ayano, who has transformed from a virgin college student into a female version of his middle school self, blindly rushes in headfirst to try and achieve his first sexual experience, but things aren't going as smoothly as he'd hope...!

title.en: Why Are You Obsessed With Your Fake Wife?

altTitles.pl: Dlaczego Masz Obsesję na Punkcie Swojej Fałszywej Żony?

description.en:
"You'd better not even dream of being recognized as my wife. There will never be an heir from a daughter of Balajit.”

Nadia couldn't agree more with his opinion.
Thank you, Marquis, be sure to keep your word.

“The Marquis said you had no intention of sleeping with me.”
“… … .”
“So, to ensure an heir, there's no other choice but to take a concubine... … .”

Nadia's head jerked at the sound of something crushing on her.
Then, out of the corner of her eyes, she saw that the table her husband was working on had cracked.

No, why did it suddenly break?
description.ko:
“내 아내로 인정받을 망상 따위 꿈에도 하지 않는 게 좋을 거다. 내가 발라지트의 딸에게서 후사를 볼 일은 영영 없을 테니.”

나디아는 하마터면 나도 같은 생각이라고 맞장구칠 뻔했다.

감사합니다, 후작놈아.
자기 입으로 한 말은 꼭 지키세요.

***

“후작님께서 저와 합방을 할 의사가 없다고 하셨거든요.”
“…….”
“그러니 후계를 위해선 어쩔 수 없이 첩을 들이는 수밖에…….”

콰직.
무언가 으스러지는 소리에 나디아의 고개가 홱 돌아갔다.
그러자 남편이 짚은 테이블의 한 구석에 금이 간 모습이 보인다.

아니, 저게 갑자기 왜 부서져?
description.pl:
"Lepiej, żebyś nie marzyła o uznaniu cię za moją żonę. Nigdy nie miałbym następcy z córką Balazita".
Słysząc to, Nadia prawie powiedziała: "Czuję to samo".
Dziękuję ci, markizie. Mam nadzieję, że dotrzymasz swoich słów.
***
"Powiedziałeś, że nie masz zamiaru dzielić ze mną łoża".
"..."
"Więc dla dobra następcy wiem, że nie masz innego wyboru, jak sprowadzić konkubinę..."
pęknięcie
Głowa Nadii odwróciła się na ten dźwięk.
W następnej chwili widzi, pęknięcie w rogu stołu, przy którym był jej mąż.
To znaczy, dlaczego ten stół nagle się złamał?

description.en:
Even he, Kang Geon-woo, a genius major leaguer who gained wealth, fame, and everything, could not continue a happy married life with his wife. He, who felt regretful about his wife's absence, returned to the past with the power of a mysterious ring.

As a high school student in the midst of a fresh romance, will he be able to find love this time?

description.en: 29-year-old programmer Suzuki Ichirou finds himself transported into a fantasy RPG. Within the game, he's a 15-year-old named Satou. At first he thinks he's dreaming, but his experiences seem very real. Due to his use of a 3-time-use special power (meteor shower), he ends up wiping out an army of lizardmen and becoming very high level. He hides his level and plans to live peacefully and meet new people, though developments in the game story (like the return of a demon king) might get in his way.
description.ja: デスマーチ真っ只中のプログラマー、”サトゥー”こと鈴木。仮眠を取っていたはずの彼は、気がつけば見たこともない異世界に放り出され、そして目の前には蜥蜴人の大軍？
description.vi:
Suzuki, một lập trình viên trưởng thành, sau khi thức dậy đột nhiên nhận ra rằng cậu bị triệu hồi vào 1 thế giới khác khi đang mặc một bộ quần áo bình thường ở cấp độ 1. Cậu đạt được cấp độ cao và kho báu sau khi sử dụng phép thuật-sẵn-có-3 lần, Mưa Thiên Thạch, chỉ với một lần và lên cấp thánh . Sau đó việc cậu dự định làm ở thế giới khác là một “chuyến du hành tham thú ngắm cảnh”?
Gặp gỡ ba cô gái người thú, hai chị em gái xinh đẹp với mái tóc tím & đen cùng một cô gái yêu tinh tóc vàng kì dị và với rất nhiều người trên chuyến du hành của cậu sau này xuất hiện rồi gia nhập dàn HAREM. Dù phải chiến đấu với ma quái và chúa quỷ, đây vẫn là câu chuyện viễn tưởng ấm áp xúc động.
description.pt-br: Suzuki Ichirou é um programado de 29 anos que subitamente fora levado a um mundo diferente, trajando apenas roupas comum e no level 1. Ele obteve um nível elevado e inúmeros tesouros após utilizar 3 vezes uma habilidade descartável, [Meteor Shower], chuva de meteoros. Após superar essa crise, ele decidiu realizar um "Turismo em outro mundo? Superando adversidades, fazendo amigos, obtendo companheiros, ocasionalmente derrotando demônios, lordes demônios e pessoas mal-intencionadas, Satou aproveita o seu dia-a-dia nesta calorosa história de fantasia.

title.en: A Tactical Genius on the Field

description.en: If there is one thing that Ma Jungwoo is good at, it's football. Although he is a genius strategist, others look down on him because of his lack of education and debt. But things seem to turn around when he finds out he has just inherited his late grandfather's British football team. He plans to sell the team and start fresh, only to find out the team has massive debt! Left with no other choice, Jungwoo must use his tactical genius to help this team rise from the ashes and be number one!

altTitles.ja: 滄元図〜最強神魔になる道〜

description.en: Meng Chuan witnessed his mother killed before his eyes, so he trained very hard hoping to one day avenge her death. But his peaceful days were broken as his wedding engagement being called off, an invasion by foreign forces, the sanctuary fallen into enemy hands… In order to protect the people of Ning City, he picked up his sword and vowed to be the strongest. This is a heavy responsibility and a long journey…
description.id: Meng Chuan menyaksikan ibunya terbunuh di depan matanya, jadi dia berlatih sangat keras berharap suatu hari bisa membalas kematiannya. Tapi hari-harinya yang damai hancur ketika pertunangan pernikahannya dibatalkan, sebuah invasi oleh pasukan asing, tempat perlindungan jatuh ke tangan musuh... Untuk melindungi orang-orang Kota Ning, ia mengambil pedangnya dan bersumpah untuk menjadi yang terkuat. Ini adalah tanggung jawab yang berat dan perjalanan yang panjang...

description.en: Is he crazy? Or just the typical attention seeker? Lee Kwang-Jin, who doesn't understand the difference in people, and his Master Kwak No who's the one helping him to understand the differences of people. A warm human story of a student and his Master.
description.ko:
미친놈인가?
아니면 흔한 관심종자인가?

사람의 다름을 이해 못 하는 제자 이강진.
그리고 그걸 이해시켜주고자 하는 스승 곽노.
두 사제師弟의 따뜻한 휴먼스토리.

description.en: Wakana Gojou is a fifteen year old high-school boy who was socially traumatized in the past due to his passions. That incident left a mark on him that made him into a social recluse. Until one day he had an encounter with Kitagawa who is a sociable gyaru, who is the complete opposite of him. They soon share their passions with one another which leads to their odd relationship.
description.fr:
Wakana Gojo est un lycéen solitaire. Son rêve est de devenir artisan et de fabriquer les poupées traditionnelles pour le Hina Matsuri. Mais comme cette passion n’est pas très virile, il la cache et ne se fait pas remarquer. Jusqu’au jour ou Marine Kitagawa, la fille la plus populaire du lycée, le voit se servir d’une machine à coudre ! Contre toute attente elle lui demande de devenir son couturier pour réaliser… des tenues de cosplay !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.tr: Wakana Gojou, vadesi geçmiş tutkuları nedeniyle toplumsal travmaları olan 15 yaşında bir liselidir. Bu olayın bıraktığı iz onu toplumdan uzak biri haline getirdi. Bir gün kendisinin tam zıttı, arkadaş canlısı bir gal olan Kitagawa ile karşılaşır. Kısa zamanda garip ilişkilerini yönlendiren tutkularını paylaşırlar.
description.uk:
Вакана Ґоджьо — п’ятнадцятилітній учень старшої школи, в минулому отримав серйозну психологічну травму на фоні свого захоплення. Внаслідок чого хлопець ізолював себе від соціуму і почав вести затворницький образ життя.
Так було би і на далі, але в життя Ґоджьо буквально увірвалась Кітаґава — дружелюбна і комунікабельна дівчина, повна його протилежність. Досить швидко вони розділили хоббі один одного, що і привело до їх досить дивних, але міцних відносин.
description.vi: Wakana Gojou 15 tuổi là 1 học sinh cao trung từng bị tổn thương tâm lý trong quá khứ do sở thích kỳ lạ của mình. Chuyện đó đã khiến cậu trở nên nhút nhát, rụt rè. Cho tới ngày nọ Gojou tình cờ gặp Kitagawa – một Gyaru – người có tính cách trái ngược hoàn toàn với cậu ấy. 2 người họ hóa ra đều có những điểm chung và đã tạo thành một mối quan hệ hài hước
description.es-la: Wakana Gojou es un joven de quince años de edad que se vio traumatizado socialmente en el pasado debido a sus pasiones. Ese incidente le dejó una marca que lo convirtió en un recluso social. Hasta que un día tuvo un encuentro con Kitagawa, una gyaru sociable, que es todo lo contrario a él. Pronto comparten sus pasiones entre sí, lo que da lugar a su extraña relación.
description.pt-br: Wakana Gojou é um garoto de quinze anos que foi socialmente traumatizado no passado devido a suas paixões. Aquele incidente deixou uma marca nele que o fez ser um recluso social. Até que um dia ele teve um encontro com Kitagawa, que é um gyaru sociável, que é o completo oposto dele. Eles logo compartilham suas paixões uns com os outros, o que leva a um relacionamento estranho.

title.en: The Oppressed Magic Tool Maker Elopes with a Mod Butler

altTitles.ja: 虐げられた魔道具士はモブ執事と駆け落ちする

description.en:
I never expected the dull butler to actually be a prince...!

Erin, a young girl who devotes herself to developing magical tools to fulfill her late mother’s dream of "making people happy with magic tools."

However, as the child of a mistress, Erin is in a difficult position and endures relentless harassment from her stepmother.

Despite her struggles to achieve her dream, Erin's hopes are crushed by her stepmother's schemes, and she is pushed to the depths of despair.

In her darkest moment, the only ally she has, the butler Foolda, reaches out to her.

"Would you elope with me?"

title.en: A Blank Slate Regression for the Idol That Lost His Original Mindset

altTitles.ko: 초심 잃은 아이돌을 위한 회귀 백서

description.en:
‘I want to do real music now instead of these fxxking idol songs.’

Yoon Eden, an idol in his 8th year, was tired of working with his shitty agency so he worked on the side as a composer.
He succeeded in music composition and bought a house in Cheongdam-dong, but has become an arrogant celebrity.

[Your 30,000th fan is disappointed in you.]
[Starting a project to help idols regain their lost, original intentions!]

But what the hell? He was sent to his debut days when his group was at its lowest to find his original intentions-

[The conditions have been met.]
[You have disappointed 30 thousand fans, now make 30 million fans happy!]

There’s even a mission that's only possible to complete for 1st tier idols?!

“Fuck, my Cheongdam-dong house! My billion-dollar royalties! My Ferrari!”

[Profanity detected.] [Original Intent -2]

[When Original Intent falls to 0, you start over again!]

Even in these harsh conditions that threaten infinite regression, will the project help this idol find his lost, original intentions?
description.ko:
‘이제는 아이돌 노래 말고 real music을 하고 싶다.’

똥망 소속사에 지쳐 작곡 부업을 뛰던 8년 차 아이돌 윤이든.
청담동 내집마련엔 성공했지만, 예술병이 세게 찾아왔다?

[3만 번째 팬이 당신에게 실망했습니다.]
[초심 잃은 아이돌을 위한 초심 되찾기 프로젝트를 시작합니다!]

그런데 웬걸. 팀 탈퇴를 앞둔 그에게 초심을 찾으라며
망돌이었던 데뷔 초 시절로 보내진 것도 모자라-

[프로젝트의 완결을 위해서는 필수 조건을 충족해야 합니다.]
[3만 명의 팬들을 실망시킨 당신, 3천만 명의 팬들을 기쁘게 만들어라!]

1군 아이돌로 성공해야 하는 미션까지 주어지는데?!

“X발, 내 청담동 집! 내 억대 저작권료! 내 페라리!”

[비속어가 감지되었습니다.] [초심도 -2]
[※초심도가 0이 되면 다시 시작합니다!]

심지어 실패하면 무한 회귀가 기다리고 있는 극악의 조건 속
초심 잃은 아이돌의 초심 되찾기 프로젝트는 무사히 성공할 수 있을까?

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダムSEED ECLIPSE

description.en:
Celebrating 20 years of *Gundam SEED*! The official *SEED* side story that will add new garnish to the Cosmic Era has begun!

In the 72nd year of Cosmic Era, there existed the Orb force "ODR," which struggled during this period that would later be called the "two blank years." Here are the unknown exploits of the ODR, who drove the new transformable unit Eclipse. The new *SEED* spin-off begins!
Chinese Mythical Beasts living in modern China.

altTitles.ja: DRAGON BALL カラー版

description.en: Goku and friends battle intergalactic evil in the greatest action-adventure-fantasy-comedy-fighting series ever! Legend has it that if all seven of the precious orbs called “Dragon Balls” are gathered together, an incredibly powerful dragon god will appear to grant one wish. Unfortunately, the orbs are scattered across the world, making them extremely difficult to collect. Enter 16-year-old Bulma, a scientific genius who has constructed a radar to detect the exact locations of the Dragon Balls. She’s on a mission to find all seven orbs, but first she must convince young Son Goku to join her on her quest. With a monkey tail, superhuman strength and a magic staff for a weapon, Son Goku is ready to set out on the adventure of a lifetime…

altTitles.ja: ドラゴンボール

altTitles.th: ดราก้อนบอล

description.da: Den fantastiske historie starter for længe siden, tusindvis af kilometer fra hovedstaden i et fjerntliggende, lille asiatisk rige, langt ude i skoven. Her bor Son-Goku, en løjerlig lille 14-årig meget stærk dreng med en praktisk abehale. Siden sin bedstefars død har han boet helt alene. Han kløver brænde med de bare næver, er nærmest usårlig og har mange bemærkelsesværdige evner.
description.de: Der kleine Einsiedler Son-Goku und das Stadtmädchen Bulma brechen gemeinsam zu einem großen Abenteuer auf: Sie wollen die sieben geheimnisvollen Dragon Balls finden, mit deren Hilfe jeder Wunsch in Erfüllung geht...
description.en:
Dragon Ball follows the adventures of Goku from his childhood through adulthood as he trains in martial arts and explores the world in search of the seven mystical orbs known as the Dragon Balls, which can summon a wish-granting dragon when gathered. Along his journey, Goku makes several friends and battles a wide variety of villains, many of whom also seek the Dragon Balls for their own desires. Along the way becoming the strongest warrior in the universe.

Part II (the post-time skip portion) of Dragon Ball is also known as 'Dragon Ball Z' in North America.

---

- **The 4th Best Selling Manga in History**
description.fi:
Pieni mutta vahva Son Goku sekä kaupunkilaistyttö Bulma lyöttäytyvät yhteen suurta seikkailua varten. He metsästävät salaperäisiä lohikäärmekuulia, jotka voivat toteuttaa omistajansa suurimman toiveen...

Sarjakuva etenee takakannesta etukanteen ja oikealta vasemmalle. Suositellaan yli 12-vuotiaille. 

[Lisätieto: Toisen painoksen kirjasta on sensuroitu perheen pienimmille sopimattomia kohtauksia vuoden 2003 pedofiliasyytösten vuoksi.]
description.fr: Les Dragon Ball, boules de cristal magiques, offrent à celui qui les détient la possibilité de réaliser tous ses voeux. Bien sûr la quête que mène Sangoku et ses amis pour les réunir n'est pas sans obstacles: tournois et combats rythment chaque tome de cette série-culte pour les jeunes adolescents. Scénarios et dialogues assez simples centrés sur la confrontation entre les différents protagonistes. Les textes se résument parfois aux cris des combattants mais le succès de la série dépasse largement cela, pour en faire un véritable mythe auprès de la jeune génération.
description.id: Son Goku adalah seorang anak laki-laki yang luar biasa yang tinggal di dalam gunung. Suatu hari dia berjumpa dengan Bulma yang sedang dalam perjalanan mencari Dragon Ball. Akhirnya mereka bersama-sama menjadi tujuh buah Dragon Ball. Ternyata Dragon Ball ke enam ada di gunjung Frypan yang sedang terbakar...
description.lt:
Susipažinkite su tyros širdies beždžionuodegiu berniuku Sangoku, atvykėliu iš kito pasaulio. Jis nepaprastai stiprus, o dar nepaprastesni jo nuotykiai. Sutikęs padėti aikštingai šešiolikmetei mergaitei Bulmai Sangokas leidžiasi į neįtikėtiną kelionę ieškoti septynių drakono rutulių, kuriuos surinkus galingasis drakonas išpildys bet kokį norą. Bet tai įvyksta tik kartą per metus! Paskui rutuliai vėl išsibarsto, juos vėl reikia rinkti, kad noras būtų išpildytas. Keliaudamas narsusis Gokas suras pavidalą keičiančių draugų, mokysis pas galingiausią Rytų dvikovų meistrą, kausis pasaulio stipruolio turnyre, susirems su didžiausiais siaubūnais ir nuožmiausiais priešais. O kur dar žiaurioji Raudonojo kaspino armija ir mirtingai pavojinga Raumenų bokšto tvirtovė, kurioje tyko visas būrys nindzių, kiborgų ir dar bjauresnių tipų... Ar pavyks Sangokui rasti drakono rutulius ir likti nenugalėtam?

Komikso „Drakonų kovos“ veiksmas vyksta kiniškoje aplinkoje, bet nebūtinai Kinijoje. Tiksli vieta nežinoma. Pati istorija labai paprasta, bet kurdamas norėčiau ją papildyti vis naujomis detalėmis ir piešiniais. Taip galiu piešti ką tik noriu ir mėgautis jauduliu bei nežinomybe, ką piešiu toliau.
Akira Torajama, 1985
description.no: Den lille enstøingen Son-Goku møter tilfeldigvis den tøffe 16 år gamle storbyjenta Bulma. Hun er på jakt etter syv mystiske dragekuler - dragonballs. Sammen reiser de videre i jakten på de magiske kulene som kan oppfylle deres innerste ønsker.
description.pl:
Manga stworzona przez Akirę Toriyamę, luźno oparta na motywach zaczerpniętych z chińskiej powieści Wędrówka na zachód. Manga składa się z 42 tomów. 
Głównym bohaterem Dragon Balla jest chłopiec z ogonem imieniem Son Gokū, który wraz z nowo poznaną przyjaciółką Bulmą wyrusza w podróż w poszukiwaniu tajemniczych Smoczych Kul. Gdy zbierze się siedem kul, pojawia się smok – Shen Long (pol. Boski Smok), który spełni jedno życzenie. Mimo, iż od wielu lat nikt nie zdołał zebrać wszystkich kul, w dalszych losach udaje się to. Son Gokū już jako dziecko dysponuje potężną siłą (potrafi udźwignąć samochód), a z biegiem czasu staje coraz silniejszy, i wraz z przyjaciółmi broni losów Ziemi, a nawet wszechświata.
description.ru: Манга «Жемчуг дракона» во многом перекликается с произведением китайской классической литературы «Путешествие на Запад», авторство которого приписывают У Чэн-Эню. Имя главного героя манги, Сон Гоку,— это японское чтение имени Сунь У-кун, Царя Обезьян, главного героя «Путешествия на Запад». Можно провести параллели и между другими персонажами «Путешествия на Запад» и «Жемчуга дракона». Булма, задавшаяся целью найти семь волшебных жемчужин, имеет много общего с монахом Сюань-цзаном, который отправляется в путешествие в Индию за священными сутрами. Два других спутника Булмы, Улун и Ямча, это пародия на свиноподобного Чжу Ба-цзе и демона Ша-сэна. А Князь-Бык Гюмао — быкоголовый демон Нюмован, которого путешественники повстречали на своем пути. В «Жемчуге дракона» фигурируют не только персонажи, но и предметы из романа «Путешествие на Запад»: волшебное облако Цзиньдоуюнь, на котором можно летать по небу, посох Царя Обезьян жуйбан, меняющий длину по воле хозяина, и многое-многое другое. Некоторые имена и названия мы перевели на китайский лад, чтобы внести в повествование капельку экзотического колорита, присущего оригиналу, другие же оставили в японском прочтении. Это сделано потому что поклонники манги и снятого по ней аниме во всем мире уже давно знают и любят их героев именно под японскими именами. Мы надеемся, что такая смесь имен и названий не помешает восприятию манги, так как весь мир, созданный автором, и без того являет собой беспорядочное смешение всевозможных языков, культур и времен. А вот в переводе названия манги мы решили отклониться от общепринятого варианта ради сохранения авторской шутки. Дело в том, что Dragon Ball — это прежде всего сорт китайского зеленого чая, вручную скрученного в шарики. Кстати, улун и пуэр — тоже китайские сорта чая, а ямча — китайская разновидность чайной церемонии. Автор вовсю обыгрывал «чайное» название манги, так почему же нам не подыграть ему?
description.uk:
Кулі Дракона... Сім містичних сфер, здатні виконати одне заповітне бажання: від нескінченного запасу полуниці до вічної юності та влади над цілим світом!

У пошуках цих артефактів дівчинка Бульма знайомиться із Соном Ґокӯ – маленьким хлопчиком із мавпячим хвостиком. Він дещо дивакуватий, але доброзичливий, наївний і неймовірно сильний! Разом вони вирушать у подорож, сповнену пригод, ворогів, небезпеки та битв за долю цілого світу!
description.zh: 相传，有七颗龙珠散落在世界的各个角落，当它们被聚集到一起时神龙就会出现，能够实现你的任何一个愿望。这个一个美丽的的传说引出了小悟空和他的朋友们寻找龙珠的故事。
description.es-la:
Por fin! Edición nacional de DragonBall, uno de los mangas más reconocidos a nivel mundial, que originalmente fue publicado en el Shonen Jump de Shueisha entre 1984 y 1995. La historia de Son Goku, el guerrero que, junto a sus amigos, protege a la Tierra de los más diversos y poderosos enemigos desde que es un chico hasta que es un adulto. Una serie que arranca con aventura y prosigue con mucha acción, aunque también algo de comedia. Esta edición argentina es completamente fiel a la japonesa, respetando el sentido de lectura oriental e incluyendo varios extras y sección de aclaraciones de la traducción. Su periodicidad es mensual.

---
Goku, es un niño muy especial que ha tenido que valerse por sí mismo en medio de la naturaleza y sin contacto con otras personas. Un día conoció a Bulma, una chica que busca las siete Esferas del Dragón, estos son elementos mágicos que al ser reunidos invocan a un dios dragón llamado Shenlong, el cual concederá un único deseo, cualquiera que este sea. Goku se une a Bulma en la búsqueda de las esferas sin imaginar que hay otros seres muy peligrosos que también las desean.
description.pt-br:
Dragon Ball segue as aventuras de Son Goku desde sua infância até a idade adulta e como ele treina artes marciais e explora o mundo em busca das sete esferas místicas conhecidas como as esferas do dragão, que pode invocar um dragão que concede desejos quando reunidos. Ao longo de sua jornada, Goku faz vários amigos e batalhas com uma grande variedade de vilões, muitos dos quais também procuram as esferas do dragão para seus próprios desejos. Ao longo do caminho se tornar o guerreiro mais forte do universo.

---
Tudo começa com o pequeno rapaz, Son Goku, que mora sozinho numa montanha. Foi encontrado numa floresta pelo velho Son Gohan que o ensinou a arte do kung fu. Numa noite, Gohan foi morto por um monstro misterioso. Ágil e forte e sem maldade, Goku destaca das outras pessoas por ter um rabo de macaco. A história começa quando Goku conhece Bulma, uma rapariga que o convence a ajudá-la na procura das 7 Bolas do Dragão que, quando reunidas, podem realizar um desejo através da invocação ao Deus Dragão…

---
A obra-prima escrita e desenhada pelo mestre Akira Toriyama, está de volta ao Brasil! Son Goku é um pequeno órfão de coração puro, mas com uma tremenda força. Depois de viver tanto tempo isolado da civilização, ele recebe a inesperada visita de uma garota! Bulma lhe propõe uma parceria para buscar as sete Esferas do Dragão, que, quando reunidas, são capazes de realizar qualquer desejo! Perigos e adversários não faltarão no caminho dessa dupla inusitada, e os mais variados personagens marcarão presença nesta aventura cheia de humor! Não perca a chance de acompanhar Goku em sua jornada, na conquista de novos amigos e na superação de todos os desafios com sua personalidade cativante e incríveis habilidades! Prepare-se para esta viagem cheia de reviravoltas, que a aventura já vai começar!
description.zh-hk: 從前從前，在距離都市數千公里外的某座深山裡住著一名叫孫悟空的男子，他身上有一顆爺爺留給他的４星龍珠…這個異想天開的故事，就由此拉開了序幕…76P極致彩頁大方分享！完全版三大特點：1.全套封面都是鳥山明老師新畫！2.雜誌連載時彩稿原封不動，忠實呈現！3.裝訂豪華，並收錄未公開之插畫！

title.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Villainess

altTitles.zh: 杀死男主然后成为女魔头

altTitles.ru: Убить главного героя, чтобы стать злодейкой

altTitles.zh-ro: Sha Si Nan Zhu Ranhou Chengwei Nv Mo Tou
Shā Sǐ Nán Zhǔ Ránhòu Chéngwéi Nǚ Mó Tóu

altTitles.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Demoness

altTitles.vi: Giết Chết Nam Chính, Ta Trở Thành Nữ Ma Đầu.

description.en:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
description.ru:
Убив главного героя, девушка становится монстром в глазах других, но, собираясь насладиться свободой, трагично погибает и оказывается в начале игры. Сохранив знания и навыки из прошлой жизни, она собирается повторить своё убийство, однако происходящее кажется немного… странным.
«Да кто же ты такой?!»
description.zh: 杀死男主角后，原小白花女二黑化成了女魔头，正当她快意江湖的时候却暴毙回到游戏的开头。继承了上周目所有能力的她准备先下手为强再次杀死男主，只是现在的情况好像有点……意外？ “不对，你到底谁啊——？！”

title.en: Saikyou wa Inaka Nouka no Ossan Deshita ~Saikou Rank no Dragon o Kujo Shita Kekka, Jitsuryoku ga Sekai ni Baremashita~

altTitles.ja: 最強は田舎農家のおっさんでした～最高ランクのドラゴンを駆除した結果、実力が世界にバレました～

altTitles.ja-ro: Saikyou wa Inaka Nouka no Ossan deshita: Saikou Rank no Dragon wo Kujo shita Kekka, Jitsuryoku ga Sekai ni Baremashita

altTitles.en: A Middle-Aged Farmer in the Countryside Was the Strongest: The World Found Out His True Strength After He Exterminated the Highest Ranked Dragon
The Strongest Was a Country Farmer Old Man ~As a Result of Exterminating the Highest Rank Dragon, His Ability Was Revealed to the World~

description.en: The streaming guild that Goshu belonged to fired him and posted a video humiliating him to boost their followers. Disgraced, Goshu takes refuge in a small village where he starts streaming videos about farming. However, his peaceful life drastically changes when a dragon appears in the area. Goshu easily defeats the creature, but the incident is recorded and goes viral, causing a huge stir among his viewers.

title.en: Kino no Tabi - the Beautiful World (Shiomiya)

altTitles.ja: キノの旅 -the Beautiful World-

altTitles.fr: L'odyssée de Kino - Un monde magnifique

description.en:
Destination is a state of mind. A tale of one girl and her bike and the road ahead. Kino wanders around the world on the back of Hermes, her unusual, anthropomorphic motorcycle, only staying in each country for three days. During their adventures, they find happiness, sadness, pain, decadence, violence, beauty, and wisdom. But through it all, they never lose their sense of freedom. They discover that because of the world's imperfections, it is actually a thing of beauty. "The world is not beautiful, therefore it is."
___
[Alt Official English (Kodansha USA)](https://kodansha.us/series/kinos-journey/)
description.pt-br: Destino é um estado de espírito. Um conto de uma garota e sua moto e a estrada à frente. Kino vagueia pelo mundo na garupa de Hermes, sua motocicleta incomum e antropomórfica, permanecendo em cada país apenas por três dias. Durante suas aventuras, eles encontram felicidade, tristeza, dor, decadência, violência, beleza e sabedoria. Mas, apesar de tudo, eles nunca perdem seu senso de liberdade. Eles descobrem que, por causa das imperfeições do mundo, ele é, na verdade, uma coisa bela. "O mundo não é bonito, portanto, é."
